input.sentences: our first snow on the farm .
the chickens came out to see what all the new things on the ground were !
our sheep cuddled up together to keep each other warm .
the tractor gets stuck in the snow which means no work for today !
good thing our heat tank is full !
output.sentences: The snow really makes our farm look super nice.
I am not sure that our chickens really like it.
The sheep on the other hand, like to cuddle to keep warm.
The tractor sure does look lovely with that snow.
I am so thankful that we have a tank heat.
